name: Back To Stage
description:
The headliner is playing, reach the stage!

You wake up on the campsite. Missing either your sense of hearing or seeing and now have to find your way to the main stage.

Throw beer at other persons, trying to stop you from reaching your goal and use the audio sources as orientation points. Dont get distrected by other side stages like the Reggae stage or the Beermass.

Control your direction with W,A,S,D. Throw beer with the left mouse button and slam with the right.

This game was created during the Health Game Jam 2020.

Credits - Back Stage Bastis - NameJobAndreas Buhs aka Gitarrenbasti Sound Design Manuel Buß aka DosenbierbastiProgrammingSebastian Genz aka OG Sebastian 3D Art Stefan Gores aka Synthiseb Sound DesignSebastian Koczwara aka OG SebasProgrammingBenndikt Liebmann aka ShadersebShader KungFuJaina Tschritter aka SleepysebProgramming
